title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button in the preview, all parameter values are empty in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog.
EB: When clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the 'Enter Parameters' dialog should display the default values for each parameter, so that I can modify the parameters I want to change without having to input all values.
SR:
1. Open the report preview.
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Observe that the 'Enter Parameters' dialog opens with all parameter values empty instead of showing the default values.
4. Attempt to modify a parameter and notice that you have to manually input all values.
